DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Bone Marrow Blast Cell Percentage Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for questions addressing the percentage of blasts in bone marrow.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Bone Marrow Blast Cell Percentage
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes._An immature blood cell._A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Concepts.definition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes.
A precursor cell which gives rise to a fully differentiated cell of hematopoietic lineage.
A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have bone marrow
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have bone marrow blasts of at least 10 percent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has MDS, does their pre-HCT bone marrow show less than or equal to 5% blasts by morphology and flow cytometry (if available) on the pre-transplant bone marrow evaluation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have MDS with <5% blasts by morphology and flow cytometry (if available) on the pre-transplant bone marrow evaluation?
